Package cp213

Class RTModel

java.lang.Object
cp213.RTModel
public class RTModel extends Object
The Right Triangle Model. Allows users to update the base and height separately.
Version:
2022-07-09
Author:
David Brown from Byron Weber-Becker

    RTModel.Type
    Used to signal a change in the properties of the model.
